trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"></xref> implementation so that you can use the "weak event listener" pattern to attach listeners for the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供<xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"></xref>實作，讓您可以使用 「 弱式事件接聽程式 」 模式來附加接聽程式<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: In order to be listeners in this pattern, your listener objects must implement <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>.
trans-unit.target: 若要在此模式中的接聽程式，接聽程式物件必須實作<xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>.</xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>

trans-unit.source: You do not need to implement <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener> on the class that is the source of the events.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要實作<xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>是事件來源類別上。</xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified event handler, which is called when specified source raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 加入指定的事件處理常式，當指定的來源引發時呼叫<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The source object that the raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 來源物件，會引發<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The delegate that handles the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 處理委派<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified listener to the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event of the specified source.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的接聽程式，來加入<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>指定來源的事件。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The object with the event.
trans-unit.target: 與事件物件。

trans-unit.source: The object to add as a listener.
trans-unit.target: 要加入做為接聽程式的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new object to contain listeners to the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 傳回新的物件，以便包含接聽程式，以<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: A new object to contain listeners to the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 新的物件，以便包含接聽程式，以<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified event handler from the specified source.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的來源中移除指定的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The source object that the raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 來源物件，會引發<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The delegate that handles the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 處理委派<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified listener from the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event of the specified source.
trans-unit.target: 移除指定的接聽程式從<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>指定來源的事件。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The object with the event.
trans-unit.target: 與事件物件。

trans-unit.source: The listener to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的接聽程式。

trans-unit.source: Begins listening for the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event on the specified source.
trans-unit.target: 開始接聽<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件上指定的來源。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The object with the event.
trans-unit.target: 與事件物件。

trans-unit.source: Stops listening for the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event on the specified source.
trans-unit.target: 停止接聽<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件上指定的來源。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The object with the event.
trans-unit.target: 與事件物件。
